pages.text: $(li)Bad Eagles are flying creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can tame this creatures feeding them with $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/blobfish)Fish Oil$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be commanded to follow, stay and wander, but, they can also be used for falconry with the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/falconry_glove)Falconry Glove$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/falconry_hood)Falconry Hood$(/l).
Tamed Bald Eagles can be healed with any fish and bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l).
